pkgmetadata.longdescription: Subpopulation Treatment Effect Pattern Plot (STEPP) // A method to explore the treatment-covariate interactions in survival or generalized linear model (GLM) for continuous, binomial and count data arising from two or more treatment arms of a clinical trial. A permutation distribution approach to inference is implemented, based on permuting the covariate values within each treatment group. Bonetti M, Gelber RD (2004) DOI:10.1093/biostatistics/5.3.465.
